content: tail and attach the other side of the pom-pom to the opposite side of the hole and secure with a knot weave in ends and block © emma kerian 2017 *note you need to attach both sides of the pom pom tightly enough to the two opposite sides of the 1 hole so that the pom-pom doesn t flop around but it needs to be loose enough so that you are able to push the pom- pom through to the other side of the hat adjust the gauge accordingly before tying the knots and permanently securing the pom-pom to the hat tips and tricks for a slouchier look knit body an additional 1 before beginning crown shaping use duplicate stitching to weave in ends so that the ends blend in to both sides of the hat use a pom pom maker to ensure a uniform pom pom after pushing your pom pom through the hole it may get squished and need reshaping if doing finishing option 3 © emma kerian 2017
